objects.text:
• Unique hand-painted design
• Premium leather construction
• Durable rubber sole
• Eco-friendly materials
DOUBLE THE STYLE, DOUBLE THE FUN!
Artistic Comfort: Handcrafted Bohemian Leather Sneaker

product_details.name: Artistic Comfort: Handcrafted Bohemian Leather Sneaker
product_details.description:
• Unique hand-painted design with decorative scalloped patterns
• Premium leather construction with soft interior lining
• Distinctive tan and cream color combination
• Durable rubber sole with bubble cushioning for enhanced comfort
• Traditional lace-up design with bronze eyelets
• Artisanal craftsmanship with detailed stitching
• Lightweight and flexible design for all-day wear
• Perfect blend of casual comfort and artistic expression
• Eco-friendly materials and sustainable production
• Available in unisex sizing with custom fit options

banner_details:
This visually engaging banner features a promotional offer centered around a unique handcrafted sneaker. Dominated by warm, earthy tones, the layout is structured into two primary sections divided horizontally. The top section showcases a bold headline ("heading") and subheadline ("subheading"), set in large contrasting fonts to draw immediate attention. A detailed description list ("description") highlights the product's key features, while the tagline ("tagline") and product name ("product_name") reinforce brand identity. The right side includes a prominently displayed image of a bohemian-style shoe ("product_image"). The lower section, on a rich brown background, includes a price bubble ("price") and call-to-action button ("cta") with a styled rectangle background ("cta_button_bg").

**Color Palette:**
- Light Cream (#F4EBE0) – Background  
- Rich Brown (#6B3E26) – Headings, Body Text  
- Terra Cotta (#D9622C) – Highlights, Subheading, Tagline  
- Mid Brown (#A05B2C) – Footer Background  
- Beige (#D6B88E) – Decorative Shapes  
- White (#FFFFFF) – Price Text, Button Background
product_color: The product image features a warm and earthy color palette ideal for creating an inviting and stylish advertisement banner. Dominated by shades of ochre and burnt orange, the shoe seamlessly blends tan (#D8B48F), caramel brown (#C46C32), and a creamy beige (#F5E0C5), creating depth and visual interest. The darker orange laces (#A9471C) act as a vibrant contrast, pulling focal attention upward, while the inner lining's pale bluish-gray (#D0D4D7) adds a cool balance without disrupting the warm aesthetics. The highlight details in white (#FAF6F0) carve out design elements, enhancing the visual flow and accentuating the shoe’s artistic, handcrafted look.
